pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This scenery shot begins on a stone patio overlooking a green field with horses grazing in the distance. The camera then tilts down to focus on the wet, stone-paved surface of the patio. Two potted plants sit at the edge of the patio where it meets the grass.
